payflow_advanced_orderstored.label: PayPal Previous Order Credit Card Settings

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Will appear as an admin-only payment option allowing use of the same card that was used on the specific previous order selected.

paypal_orderstored_billing_agreement.label: PayPal Previous Order Billing Agreement Settings

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Will appear as an admin-only payment option allowing use of the same billing agreement that was used on the specific previous order selected.

active.label: Enabled

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Will appear as a payment option only for customers who have at least one active billing agreement.

paypal_payflow_orderstored_billing_agree.label: PayPal Previous Order Billing Agreement Settings

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Will appear as an admin-only payment option allowing use of the same billing agreement that was used on the specific previous order selected.

allow_ba_signup.label: Billing Agreement Signup
allow_ba_signup.comment: Whether to create a billing agreement, if there are no active billing agreements available.
allow_ba_signup.tooltip: Merchants need to apply to PayPal for enabling billing agreements feature. Do not enable this option until PayPal confirms that billing agreements are enabled for your merchant account.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment:
Will appear as a payment option only for customers who have at least one active billing agreement.
NOTE: Payflow Pro must be enabled for this method to be available.

paypaluk_orderstored_agreement.label: Payflow Pro Order Stored Billing Agreement Settings

paypaluk_orderstored_agreement_active.label: Enabled
paypaluk_orderstored_agreement_active.comment:
Will appear as an admin-only payment option for customers or guests who have placed an order creating or using a billing agreement.
NOTE: Payflow Pro must be enabled for this method to be available.
